title: Pokédex
description: An interactive Pokédex application powered by Vue.js and the PokeAPI, allowing users to search, explore, and view detailed Pokémon data.

title: Zipcy Collector
description: A tool that automates the bulk download of 8.9k Zipcy’s SuperNormal NFT images, streamlining NFT management for collectors.

title: Infinite Mondrian Art
description: A JavaScript-powered generative art project inspired by Piet Mondrian, creating infinite unique compositions with bold lines and colors.

title: HTML Reserved Colors
description: A simple yet powerful color picker that lets users instantly select and copy HTML reserved colors with a single click.

title: Horizontal Scrolling Theater
description: A modern Vue.js-based movie shopping website with an innovative horizontal scrolling interface for browsing and purchasing films.

title: Vanilla Calculator
description: An elegant and minimalistic calculator built with vanilla JavaScript, delivering instant results with every input.

title: Draggable To-do List
description: A productivity-focused to-do list featuring drag-and-drop reordering, autosave functionality, and markdown support for note-taking.

title: Dribbble Works
description: Explore my design portfolio on Dribbble, showcasing creative projects and professional work.

title: Blog Posts
description: Dive into my latest blog articles on web development, design insights, and personal experiences in the tech world.
